string-array.name: help_answers
string-array.item: One Security is a utility designed to keep your mobile and data safe from potential malicious internet attacks. It uses Tencent patent-pending cloud-based virus scan technology, certificated by most prestigious AV-Comparatives & West coast Labs Checkmark, thus One Security can quickly and accurately identify and remove emerging threats from viruses and malware.

The standard features apply for both basic and VIP users.Upgrading to VIP entitles you to premium features:\n1) Up to date virus database protects your mobile from all latest threats.Upgrade to VIP for automatic virus database upgrades.\n2) Personal Privacy Space to keep your notes and photos more private.
First, you need to enter VIP Zone, and click \"Get More Days\", then make the payment by following instructions. After successful payment you will become a VIP user and enjoy all exclusive features.

First, enter VIP Zone, then click \"30 Days FREE Trial\" to apply for free VIP trial through sharing One Security via SMS. After sharing with 5 friends via SMS, you can get one-month free VIP trial for all VIP features.

You can click \"Scan\" on the main interface to perform a quick antivirus scan. This process will quickly detect risks if there are potential vulnerable malware and viruses in your mobile. And then you can choose whether to remove them to make your mobile safe.

Scanning viruses regularly is an effective way to protect your mobile. By clicking \"Scan\", you can quickly scan the most vulnerable part of the mobile to protect it from virus infection. And \"Full Scan\" can scan your mobile thoroughly and remove detected viruses.
By clicking \"Go\", One Security will clean up the phone cache, terminate unnecessary processes, and improve the operating speed of your mobile system.
With this feature, you can view and manage all running apps on your mobile. If you feel mobile response speed is slow than usual, you might want to stop some of those running apps.

Privacy Space is a safe area for your enhanced data privacy. It can keep unlimited notes (for all users) and photos (exclusive for VIP) in a password-protected space and away from unauthorized access.
To import photos into Privacy Space, you need to upgrade to be VIP users.
Open Menu, and select \"About\", then click \"Update\". The app will be updated if there is a new version detected.
Open menu, and select \"Feedback\". Input your advice or issues and click \"send\". Our service team would response your feedback shortly.
Open menu, select \"Settings\" and switch off \"Icon on status bar\".
